Dialogue.Page: Oh, hey! I almost forgot to tell you about that!

All the travelers worked together to set up a little scavenger hunt for you, kinda like an "Introduction to the Solar System," I think. Even Feldspar made sure to participate before they, y’know, disappeared.
Anyway, the first hint is a recording from Esker, sitting right next to me. They should give you a better idea of what exactly you’re supposed to be doing for this.
